attributes.action: Make a law to give and protect freedom of speech
attributes.additional_details: We should not have to fear for our freedom over words or memes said on social media or otherwise. If the prisons are full they should be filled with dangerous people, not people who spoke freely.
attributes.background: I want the government to provide a similar law to the americans 1st amendment law, freedom of speech should be given to everyone and protected despite hurt feelings.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701561
